Statement Text: The H5N1 wave is now considered the most expensive animal-health disaster in U.S. history.
State authorities remain on high alert for new H5N1 cases.
H5N1 is deadly from the start, veterinarians warn.
Officials feared a repeat outbreak that killed 50 million birds.
State labs say they are fully prepared to handle any new detections.
Notes: Q5: fully prepared calming cue pattern
